document.full_text: a morgan stanley  securities joint venture in japan with mitsubishi ufj financial group (mufg)  said it will lose nearly $2 billion after its fixed income traders took market positions which were larger than its "financial fitness" and then made wrong bets.
document.title: morgan stanley, mufg jv to book $1.7 billion loss
lines_and_colors: a morgan stanley  securities joint venture in japan with mitsubishi ufj financial group (mufg)  said it will lose nearly $2 billion after its fixed income traders took market positions which were larger than its "financial fitness" and then made wrong bets.
